bibl.title: The Alleged Conservatism of Attic Epigraphical Documents: A Different View.
Studies in Attic Epigraphy, History and Topography presented to Eugene Vanderpool
bibl.author: Threatte, Leslie

bibl.note: La comparaison entre le grec d'Égypte et l'attique révèle une importante disparité chronologique dans les changements phonétiques.
Threatte Leslie, The Alleged Conservatism of Attic Epigraphical Documents: A Different View.
Studies in Attic Epigraphy, History and Topography presented to Eugene Vanderpool = Hesperia. Supplement XIX (1982) pp. 148-156.
